title: Booking Accommodation
description: Where you stay can define your travel experience. From luxury hotels to cozy homestays, choosing wisely based on location, budget, and reviews is key.
sentences: Location is crucial; staying centrally or near key attractions can save you time and money on transport.
Always read recent reviews on multiple platforms before making a booking.
Compare prices on aggregators like MakeMyTrip and Goibibo, but also check the hotel's own website.
For a local and budget-friendly experience, consider hostels, guesthouses, or Airbnb.
Ensure the accommodation provides your essential amenities (e.g., Wi-Fi, AC, hot water).
dos: Book well in advance, especially if you're traveling during peak season or holidays.
Confirm your check-in and check-out times with the property.
Call the hotel directly a day before your arrival to confirm your booking.
Take screenshots of your booking confirmation.
donts: Don't book a place that has no reviews or consistently bad recent reviews.
Don't forget to check the hotel's cancellation policy before you book.
Don't pay the full amount upfront if there is a 'pay at hotel' option.
Don't ignore the location on a map; check its actual distance from places you want to visit.
